message: Hello Bob, I am offering you our premium product for $125. This product has exceptional quality and features that we believe you would appreciate. We are confident it will add significant value to your needs.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save some money, but I still want to get a good deal. Can you meet me at $90?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I am unable to accept $90 due to the value and quality of the item. However, I am willing to negotiate further. How about we aim for a price of $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but $105 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $97.50? I think that's a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.
